queries.query: IF (DB_ID('university') IS NULL) BEGIN CREATE DATABASE university ON ( NAME = university_db, FILENAME = 'C:\database\university_db.mdf', SIZE = 128MB, MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 15% ) LOG ON ( NAME = university_log, FILENAME = 'C:\database\university_db.ldf', SIZE = 128MB, MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 15% ) END

IF (DATABASE_PRINCIPAL_ID('UniversitySA') IS NULL) BEGIN CREATE LOGIN UniversitySA WITH PASSWORD = '1university@SECRET!', DEFAULT_DATABASE = university CREATE USER UniversitySA FOR LOGIN UniversitySA END
GRANT CONTROL ON DATABASE::university TO UniversitySA
